title: FS:  T3 Turkey Red - Matty  SOLD
author: T3s

posts.post_title: FS:  T3 Turkey Red - Matty  SOLD
posts.post_content:
T3 Turkey Red Christy Mathewson - Graded PSA-3MK.

Not sure about the MK, but it must be the faint mark or two on the right front border, can't see anything else.

The bottom left corner chip is obvious, but overall it is a beautiful card with a clean, clear and focused image.  No creases that I can detect.

Not sure about VCP, but SMR on a PSA-3 is $2200, on a PSA-2 it's $1300.  SOLD - Thank you!

Please feel free to ask any questions.  PM me or email me direct at [url]mackeyd@mailcity.com[/url]

Thanks,
Craig
